original_text: And he shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: prayer also shall be made for him continually; and daily shall he be praised.
korean_text: 그들이 생존하여 스바의 금을 그에게 드리며 사람들이 그를 위하여 항상 기도하고 종일 찬송하리로다

sentences.original_text: and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba
prayer also shall be made for him continually
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 위해 기도가 계속해서 올려질 것이며

sentences.original_text: and daily shall he be praised
